formula.name: Buffalo
formula.reference: Xrn = abs(Xr * (Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + 5 * Xi2 * Xi2)) + Cr; Xin = abs(Xi * (5 * Xr2 * Xr2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Xi2 * Xi2)) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(5 * Xr * Xi2 * Xi2 - 10 * Xr2 * Xr * Xi2 + Xr2 * Xr2 * Xr, 20 * Xr * xi * Xi2 * Xi - 30 * Xr2 * xr * Xi2 + 30 * Xr * xi2 * Xi2 - 30 * Xr * xr2 * Xi2 - 20 * Xr2 * Xr * xi * Xi - 60 * Xr2 * xr * xi * Xi + 20 * Xr * xi2 * xi * Xi - 60 * Xr * xr2 * xi * Xi + 5 * Xr2 * Xr2 * xr - 10 * Xr2 * Xr * xi2 + 10 * Xr2 * Xr * xr2 - 30 * Xr2 * xr * xi2 + 10 * Xr2 * xr2 * xr + 5 * Xr * xi2 * xi2 - 30 * Xr * xr2 * xi2 + 5 * Xr * xr2 * xr2 + 5 * xr * Xi2 * Xi2 + 20 * xr * xi * Xi2 * Xi + 30 * xr * xi2 * Xi2 - 10 * xr2 * xr * Xi2 + 20 * xr * xi2 * xi * Xi - 20 * xr2 * xr * xi * Xi + 5 * xr * xi2 * xi2 - 10 * xr2 * xr * xi2 + xr2 * xr2 * xr) + cr; xin = diffabs(Xi2 * Xi2 * Xi - 10 * Xi2 * Xi * Xr2 + 5 * Xi * Xr2 * Xr2, 5 * Xi2 * Xi2 * xi - 20 * Xi2 * Xi * xr * Xr + 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xi2 - 10 * Xi2 * Xi * xr2 - 30 * Xi2 * xi * Xr2 - 60 * Xi2 * xr * xi * Xr + 10 * Xi2 * xi2 * xi - 30 * Xi2 * xr2 * xi + 20 * Xi * xr * Xr2 * Xr - 30 * Xi * xi2 * Xr2 + 30 * Xi * xr2 * Xr2 - 60 * Xi * xr * xi2 * Xr + 20 * Xi * xr2 * xr * Xr + 5 * Xi * xi2 * xi2 - 30 * Xi * xr2 * xi2 + 5 * Xi * xr2 * xr2 + 5 * xi * Xr2 * Xr2 + 20 * xi * xr * Xr2 * Xr - 10 * xi2 * xi * Xr2 + 30 * xi * xr2 * Xr2 - 20 * xi2 * xi * xr * Xr + 20 * xi * xr2 * xr * Xr + xi2 * xi2 * xi - 10 * xi2 * xi * xr2 + 5 * xi * xr2 * xr2) + ci;
